display_long_description:
Exercise the mind, body & soul in this fast-paced feast of micro challenges, high intensity boss battles and a concoction of collectibles that unravel as you jog across vibrant backdrops of color and joy.

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE
Get physical with lifelike jog-in-place controls or stick with the less intensive arm-swing mode as you run for your life through the bright and stylish world of madness.

[media]


# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

[media]


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

[media]


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

[media]


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

[media]


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

[media]

It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57570293_4078635569072597_4548948488473550523_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=RebNNJezGYIQ7kNvgGnQUJp&_nc_oc=AdgupZRx8roIw7BBYESfFvILJELQzAHbY8ERl5fWi5b_ec467XYtas-CiPlbguwOjs4&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYE0Zaz7i3SVjCYixIFGHhXNEUcPgtHn0SAq8Std9mjEgQ&oe=67DA32ED)


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982723_2208705096178691_3774754884521119372_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=eGm-PLsWUNQQ7kNvgGZjeTE&_nc_oc=Adh8KMJR-AvLUkIO2fz1fRPDsw-5PMq9Gj4X4UTvgnW-PnnHx_a8kgxsHJLk_57qW2U&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYFI0ZXPPtDv_SdJo4HuCplQeOHPglqLxrlbnjZrt96gpg&oe=67DA4750)


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.
